Title: ToolkitVB.net is a set of Multipurpose Tools for Asp.net written in VB
Description:
Toolkit for ASP.net vb. Includes:
URL rewritting compatible with Godaddy.com and other shared hosting environments.
Embedded images and JavaScript for custom controls.
Error handling system.
Application Variable based Instant Messaging System Foundation.
